title: I can't refund my champion!
body:
Well I used one of my refunds to refund Vladimir and bought Draven. I got a skin for Draven in the 'Loot and Crafting' and unlocked it, I slowly started to dislike Draven's gameplay and I went to the store to refund the champion. It said 'Not Refundable' so as with the 'Gladiator Draven' skin.                                                                        

Any help on how to refund it?

replies.body: Currently items obtained from Hextech Crafting cannot be refunded, or for the ingredients to be reused.  It seems that Draven may not be refundable because it still has the skin on the account.  We may be able to help out with your specific issue.  Please [submit a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)and we can look into this further for your case.  Please let me know if you have any questions!
I have already used my 3 refunds after you made this reply, thank you for your support anyways. :0

Hey there,

Unfortunately, once you unlock a skin for a champion you must refund that skin before you can refund the champion. Since you are unable to refund Hextech loot, if you get a skin through Hextech Crafting you will be unable to refund the champion.
